name: Destined: Lost Fate - DEMO
description:
The journey begins...

Waking in the capital city of Gallott, Maria goes about her recently adopted royal status to find comfort and purpose in the man who gave her this privileged lifestyle, only to be confronted by the terrors outside the walls - the Zeiph - creatures that appeared not so long ago and brutally halted a conflict between two of the three dynasties in the kingdom by seizing control and thriving between every town and city, creating a stalemate where anyone who ventures outside their very homes could face imminent extinction.

Maria, along with her new royal family agree after years of tension and a recent turn of events that it's time to fight back! With or without the lingering threat of the outside world...

New locations in development for the full-game release, show your support with feedback on our devlogs - click above ^

Destined: Lost Fate adopts from different genres to create a sense of mystery, tension and evolving gameplay to keep you engaged as you unravel the secrets of the world in an attempt to find your true identity. Who's life will you take and more importantly; who's fate will be lost?

Don't forget to check out the website for more details and updates! (Donations welcome :)
